name: Booksmart (Komodo)
description:
Booksmart

You are a wizard, but you never learned how to cast spells! The only way you can cast them is by using a disposable spellcaster, and they are pretty heavy. Can you escape your current predicament?

Controls
  • Use ASD/↓←→ to move
  • Use Space/W/↑/Z to jump
  • Use Shift/X to cast a spell
Credits
  • Created by me!
  • Font used is m3x6 by Daniel Linssen
